Mix sour cream and chicken soup in a separate bowl. Spread the sour cream and soup mixture over the chicken in the casserole dish. Crush the ritz crackers and spread over top of the casserole. Spoon melted butter on top over all. Bake in a 350f oven until top is golden brown, approximately 20-30 minutes.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, ritz crackers, butter, salt and pepper

name: chicken f philly sandwich
steps: Heat the oil in a skillet. Add the onions and peppers. Cook until just soft. Add the chicken to the pan and heat. Top with the peppers and onions. Add the cheese slices and melt. Place on the buns. Serve warm.
ingredients: chicken breast, green bell pepper, onion, olive oil, mozzarella cheese, hoagie rolls

name: egg fried bread
steps: Beat the eggs and milk. Put into a bowl and add the bread and soak. Heat the butter in a frying pan. Fry the saturated bread until it is golden brown on each side. Serve.
ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, butter

name: easy and fast bread with baking powder
steps: Combine flour, salt and baking powder. Stir in water and oil until everything comes together to form a dough. Shape the dough into your favorite sizes and forms. Optionally spray with water before putting into the oven. Bake at 200c or 400f for app. 20 minutes for small breads and app. 40 minutes for large breads.
ingredients: bread flour, flour, baking powder, salt, water, vegetable oil

name: beans and sweet italian sausage
steps: Put the olive oil and garlic in a heavy saucepan that will hold the sausage in a single layer. Place it over medium-high heat and saute the garlic cloves until lightly browned on all sides. While garlic is browning, coarsely chop the fresh sage. When the garlic has browned, discard it. Add the sage to the pan and cook, stirring, for about 1 minute. Add the tomatoes and beans. Season with salt and pepper. Add the sausage. When tomatoes begin to bubble, turn the heat down to medium-low. Cover the pan and cook at a gentle simmer until the sausages feel tender when pricked with a fork, about 20 minutes. Check the pan occasionally and add a little water if all the liquid evaporates before the sausages are done.
ingredients: cannellini beans, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, fresh sage leaf, tomatoes, salt, black pepper, sweet italian sausage link

name: spicy fried ginger beef
steps: Pat meat dry, heat oil in wok over medium high heat. Add garlic and stirfry until lightly golden. Add chilis and stirfry green onion and ginger for 1 minute. Add beef and stirfry just until browned, 1 minute. Blend in fish sauce, lime juice and sugar,. Sprinkle with coriander and serve immediately.
ingredients: lean beef, peanut oil, garlic cloves, chilies, green onions, fresh ginger, fish sauce, lime juice, sugar, fresh coriander

name: scandinavian fruit soup
steps: In a kettle, cut large fruit into quarters and soak in water 1 hour. Cook 30 minutes. Add raspberry or strawberry syrup, cinnamon, salt, and lemon. Cook until soft. Stir in wine and tapioca. Cook an additional 10 minutes, stirring constantly until tapioca is clear. Serve warm or chilled as either first course or dessert.
ingredients: mixed dried fruit, water, fruit syrup, cinnamon stick, salt, lemon slices, dry red wine, quick-cooking tapioca

name: extra cheesy crescent mozzarella wedges
steps: Separate crescent dough into eight triangles. Place on a greased 12 inch round pizza pan with points toward the center. Press dough onto the bottom and up the sides of the pan making sure to seal the perforations. Brush with butter. Sprinkle with garlic powder and cheese. Bake at 375 degree oven for 15-17 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is lightly browned. Cut into wedges and serve warm.
ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, butter, garlic powder, mozzarella cheese

name: easy vanilla pudding
steps: Mix sugar, cornstarch, and salt into a saucepan. Gradully stir in milk. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Boil 1 minute, sitrring constantly. Remove from heat. Stir in butter and vanilla. Chill.
ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, salt, milk, butter, vanilla

name: smothered chicken using leftover chicken
steps: Melt butter in a skillet. Add onion and mushrooms and cook until onions are tender. Add gravy. Add chicken and mix into the sauce. Cover and cook until chicken is heated through. Top with parsley.
ingredients: butter, onion, fresh mushrooms, chicken gravy, chicken, parsley

name: mint tea from morocco
steps: Pour water into a 2-quart glass bowl. Cover and microwave on high for 8 minutes until just boiling. Little bubbles will appear on the water surface. Add sugar, tea and mint leaves. Cover with a lid or plate and let steep for 4 to 5 minutes. Stir gently. Pour tea through a sieve into glasses.
ingredients: water, green tea, sugar, fresh mint leaves

name: crispy hash browns
steps: Combine all ingredients. Do not thaw the hash browns. Place in a greased 9 x 13 pan. Combine ritz crackers with butter and sprinkle over top of mixture. Bake for 1 hour at 350 degrees. This can be prepared a day in advance and baked the day of serving.
ingredients: cream of chicken soup, frozen hash brown potatoes, cheddar cheese, butter, sour cream, salt, milk, onion, ritz cracker

name: shirley s lobster pie for one
steps: Defrost lobster if it is frozen, and cut into bite size pieces. Put crackers, broken into pieces, into a blender and chop fine. Combine lobster and crackers, then add melted butter mixed with lemon. Mix until crumbs are damp all over. Put into a small casserole dish to bake, then put 4-5 dry, broken crackers over the top. Bake at 400, for 15-20 minutes. You may add extra lemon to taste, when ready to eat. I love to dip mine in melted butter with a little bit of vinegar and salt.
ingredients: lobsters, ritz crackers, butter, lemon

name: lemon lush
steps: Mix flour, nuts and margarine. Press in pan. Bake at 375 for 15 minutes. Combine cream cheese, sugar and cool whip. Spread on crust. Mix pudding and milk, beat and spread on cream cheese mixture. Top with cool whip and sprinkle on nuts.
ingredients: flour, nuts, butter, cream cheese, powdered sugar, cool whip, lemons, milk

name: libbie s corn for freezing
steps: Cut the corn off the cob and measure 4 quarts. Be careful this gets slippery. Put all the ingredients in a large kettle. Bring to a boil. Cook for 10 minutes, stirring frequently to keep corn from sticking to bottom of pan. After 10 minutes, set aside to cool. When cool package in your freezer containers.
ingredients: corn, sugar, water, salt

name: grandma s blueberry streusel coffeecake
steps: Preheat oven to 385 degrees. Grease a 9- or 10-inch pie plate. For the streusel topping, use a fork and a small bowl to blend the sugar, flour, salt, cinnamon and butter until crumbly. Set aside. For the cake, sift together flour, baking powder and salt into a medium bowl. In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugar. Add the egg, milk and vanilla and beat until smooth. Mix in the dry ingredients, then fold in the blueberries. Spread cake mixture into prepared pie dish and sprinkle with streusel topping. Bake 50-60 minutes or until golden. Allow to cool for 20 minutes before slicing. Serve warm, if possible.
ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, cinnamon, butter, baking powder, egg, milk, vanilla extract, fresh blueberries

name: basic steamed fish
steps: Prepare the wok for steaming. Rinse the fish fillets and pat dry with paper towels. In a small bowl, whisk the rice wine or sherry, sugar, salt and sesame oil. Place the fish fillets on a deep, heat-proof plate that will fit inside the steamer basket. Pour the rice wine mixture over the fish. Sprinkle with the chopped green onion. Cover and steam the fish over high heat until the fish is opaque and flakes easily with a fork. Serve hot, garnished with the chopped cilantro and lemon wedges.
ingredients: fish fillets, mirin, granulated sugar, salt, sesame oil, green onion, cilantro, lemon

name: 24 hour green vegetable salad
steps: Place 3 cups lettuce in bottom of large glass bowl. Sprinkle with sugar, salt, and pepper. Layer eggs over lettuce. Layer peas, remaining lettuce, bacon, and cheese. Spread mayonnaise over top. Chill for 24 to 48 hours. Garnish with green onions.
ingredients: lettuce, sugar, salt and pepper, hard-boiled eggs, frozen green peas, bacon, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, green onion

name: big angel biscuits
steps: Dissolve the yeast in the warm water and set aside. Mix dry ingredients in order given and cut in shortening until dry and crumbly. Stir in the yeast-water mixture and buttermilk. Blend thoroughly. At this point you can cover and refrigerate until ready or make the biscuits now. Turn onto a floured surface and knead lightly, then roll fairly thick and cut with biscuit cutters. Place on a greased pan. Let biscuits rise slightly and bake in a 400 degree f oven until lightly browned.
ingredients: yeast, warm water, flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, sugar, shortening, buttermilk

name: whiskey kielbasa
steps: Boil kielbasa for 20 minutes. Slice kielbasa and set aside. In a saucepan, add whiskey, ketchup, and brown sugar. Bring to a boil over low heat. Cook until well combined. Transfer whiskey mixture and sliced kielbasa to a slow cooker. Cook on low for 3-4 hours.
ingredients: kielbasa, whiskey, ketchup, brown sugar

name: cheesy broccoli rice casserole
steps: Saute vegetables in butter until clear. Cook broccoli according to package directions and drain well. Add soup and cheese to broccoli. Stir in sauted celery and onions. Stir in rice and seasonings. Put into greased casserole dish, top with breadcrumbs. Bake at 350 degrees for 30-45 minutes.
ingredients: onion, celery rib, butter, frozen chopped broccoli, cream of chicken soup, cheddar cheese, cooked white rice, tabasco sauce, salt and pepper

name: black bean sweet potato burritos
steps: Saute sweet potatoes and onion in large skillet with 1 tablespoon oil just until tender. Add water or apple juice as needed to prevent sticking. Add black beans, spices and salt and cook until heated through. Divide bean mixture and cheese among tortillas and roll up. Place in 9 x 13 inch baking pan. Lightly spray with olive oil if desired. Cover pan with foil and bake at 350f for 20-25 minutes. Garnish with sour cream, salsa and fresh cilantro or wrap up for a to-go meal.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, onion, black beans, ground cumin, ground cinnamon, salt, whole wheat tortillas, soy cheese

name: pumpkin pecan crumble pie
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease 13 x 9 inch baking pan. Stir together the pumpkin, evaporated milk, eggs, sugar and pumpkin pie spice until smooth. Pour into prepared pan. Scatter dry cake mix over pumpkin mixture. Sprinkle with pecans. Pour melted butter evenly over top. Bake 50 to 60 minutes or until it tests done. Cool completely and refrigerate.
ingredients: pumpkin, evaporated milk, eggs, sugar, pumpkin pie spice, white cake mix, pecans, butter

name: fettuccine with pesto sauce
steps: Place basil, garlic, pine nuts, and cheese in a food processor and process about 15 seconds. With processor still on pour oil in through the tube in a steady stream till all the oil is used. Turn off processor. Cook fettuccine in salted boiling water to your taste. Drain pasta well. Add a some sauce to the pasta and mix pasta with the sauce. Serve pasta and add sauce to your liking.
ingredients: fresh basil leaves, garlic cloves, pine nuts, extra virgin olive oil, parmesan cheese, pecorino romano cheese, fettuccine

name: orange raisin rice blend
steps: Combine above ingredients in a heavy saucepan. Turn the heat to high. When mixture thickens, reduce heat to medium-low. Stir once with fork and cover tightly. Simmer 12-14 minutes, or until all liquid is absorbed.
ingredients: long grain rice, bouillon cubes, golden raisin, orange rind, almonds, salt, water, butter

name: blue on blue potatoes
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Saut lavender in butter on medium heat until fragrant. Add potatoes and turn to coat thoroughly with the lavender butter. Transfer potatoes into buttered casserole dish and season with salt and pepper. Bake at 350 until potatoes are tender and browned, about 35 minutes.
ingredients: blue potatoes, butter, dried lavender, salt, fresh ground pepper

name: garlic prawns in the microwave
steps: Peel and devein prawns, leaving tails intact. Put prawns into a microwave proof dish or divide prawns into 4 microproof ramekins. Combine all other ingredients and pour over prawns or divide between the 4 ramekins. Microwave on high for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve with crusty bread.
ingredients: prawns, peanut oil, garlic cloves, spring onions, dry sherry, tabasco sauce, salt and pepper

name: sausage scrambles and cheese
steps: Preheat a nonstick skillet over medium high heat. Add extra-virgin olive oil or vegetable oil, 1 turn of the pan, add sausage and brown and crumble the meat, 5 or 6 minutes. Remove the sausage from the pan and drain off some of the fat. Return pan to heat and reduce the temperature to medium low. Whisk together the eggs, half-and-half or milk, hot sauce, salt and pepper. Scramble the eggs until soft, then add cheese and continue to scramble another minute or so to finish cooking eggs and to begin to melt the cheese bits. Remove pan from heat and combine sausage and eggs. Garnish servings of the eggs with a few pieces of diced fresh tomato. Serve plates of sausage scrambles with pancakes, or for a simple supper, serve with toasted whole grain bread, buttered and drizzled with honey.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, breakfast sausage, eggs, half-and-half, hot sauce, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese, plum tomato

name: beat the blues brownies
steps: Pre heat oven to 160 c. Melt chocolate and butter in bowl over boiling water. Set aside to cool. Place flour, cocoa and baking powder in big bowl. Add sugar, eggs and melted chocolate mix. Stir till just combined. Fold through honeycomb. Spoon mix into greased and lined 20 x 30 cm slice tin. Bake 40 - 45 minutes, cool in tin.
ingredients: dark chocolate, butter, plain flour, cocoa, baking powder, brown sugar, eggs, honey comb

name: fresh peach cake
steps: In a mixing bowl, add the oil and sugar. Beat well to combine. Add the eggs, one at a time, beating after each addition. In another bowl, add the flour, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon. Stir to mix. Gradually add the flour mixture to the creamed mixture, stirring just until blended. Fold in peaches and nuts. Spoon batter into a greased and floured 13x9 inch baking pan. Bake at 325 for 40-45 minutes or until a wooden pick comes out clean. Cut into squares and top with whipped cream.
ingredients: vegetable oil, sugar, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, ground cinnamon, fresh peaches, pecans, sweetened whipped cream

name: red garlic potatoes
steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Wash and cut potatoes into halves or quarters. Try to make them approximately bite-size. Put into a mixing bowl. In a small bowl, mix the garlic salt, dill and oil. Toss potatoes in the oil mixture, coating evenly. Line a cookie sheet with tin foil and spray with no stick cooking spray. Put potatoes on sheet in a single layer. Bake for 20 minutes, and then stir. Bake for about another 20 minutes, checking frequently. Cooking time will depend on the size of the potatoes. Sprinkle with salt before serving.
ingredients: red potatoes, olive oil, garlic salt, dill, salt

name: easy stuffed mushrooms
steps: Set oven to 350 degrees. Butter a shallow baking dish. Clean mushrooms with a brush. Gently twist off stems, setting mushroom caps aside. Finely chop stems, very small. In a bowl mix crumbs with the chopped stems, melted butter, parmesan, salt, black pepper and garlic powder. Fill caps with crumb mixture. Top with grated mozza cheese. Set caps on buttered baking dish. Bake for about 7-8 mins, or until cheese is melted, and mushrooms are hot.
ingredients: fresh mushrooms, butter, bread, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper, garlic powder, mozzarella cheese

name: maple rum cider
steps: Combine all the ingredients in a large pot, with the exception of the orange slices, they are to be used for garnishing. Slowly bring to a boil and boil for 5 minutes, reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes. Remove pot from oven and discard spices. Pour cider into mug and float an orange slice in the center of mug. This cider is best when served hot.
ingredients: apple cider, maple syrup, rum, whole cloves, whole allspice, cinnamon, oranges

name: weight watchers baked cod 4 points
steps: Preheat oven to 375f sprinkle cod with salt and pepper. Put in baking dish. Mix tomato sauce, wine, and oregano. Pour over cod. Cover and bake 10-15 minutes.
ingredients: cod fish fillets, salt, pepper, tomato sauce, white wine, oregano

name: aunt anita s no bake peanut butter krispies
steps: Stir sugars and karo together in sauce pan. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat and stir in peanut butter. Mix well. Add vanilla and cereal. Roll into small balls.
ingredients: brown sugar, white sugar, light karo syrup, peanut butter, vanilla extract, rice krispies

name: sugar snap peas with pine nuts
steps: Heat oil in a large pan. Add shallots and stir fry for 3 minutes. Add garlic and pepper toss then add sugar snap peas with the pine nuts. Stir fry for 3 minutes. Stir in the basil. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: olive oil, shallot, garlic cloves, wax peppers, sugar snap peas, pine nuts, fresh basil, salt and pepper

name: quick easy oatmeal bars with chocolate topping
steps: Combine butter, brown sugar, and vanilla and beat until creamy. Beat in the eggs. Add the flour and oatmeal. Spread in a greased 9x13 pan. Bake at 350f for 20 minutes. Cool slightly. Combine chocolate chips and shortening and melt in a double boiler or carefully in a saucepan. Spread over baked mixture. Sprinkle with chopped nuts.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, flour, oatmeal, semi-sweet chocolate chips, shortening, walnuts

name: naked tater all the way
steps: Peel, slice and cook potatoes until tender or use an equal amount of leftover potatoes. Mash potatoes by hand with a potato masher just to break them up. Add remaining ingredients and stir to mix. Bake in oven at 350f until hot and bubbly. Turn broiler on to brown top if desired.
ingredients: potatoes, butter, sour cream, milk, bacon bits, cheddar cheese, green onions, garlic powder, salt and pepper

name: celery soup australia
steps: Simmer celery and stock until celery is tender. Add celery salt and nutmeg. Make a paste of flour with 2 tablespoonfuls milk. Add to celery, stirring carefully. Add 3 cups milk and heat. Do not boil. Add cheese and serve hot.
ingredients: celery, chicken stock, celery salt, nutmeg, all-purpose flour, milk, cheddar cheese

name: baltimore crock pot beef stew
steps: Brown meat in skillet. Place meat in crock pot first, then add pepper and onion soup mix. Add gravy, then potatoes, carrots, peas, and mushrooms, in that order. Pour wine over top. Cover and cook on low for 7-9 hours. Stir in flour by the teaspoon in the last hour of cooking to desired thickness, if necessary. Add a dash or two of worcestershire sauce, if desired.
ingredients: stew meat, dry onion soup mix, mushroom gravy, potatoes, baby carrots, peas, mushrooms, dry white wine, black pepper, flour

name: sweet and sour cucumber slices
steps: Trim the ends of the cucumbers and slice them lengthwise in half, then run the tines of a fork several times down the length to creat a slight decoration on the skin. Scoop out the seeds with a spoon and cut the cucumber halves into 3-inch sections. Cut the sections, along the length, into almost paper thin slices and place in a bowl. Mix the remaining ingredients. Add to the cucumbers and toss lightly to coat the slices. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes. Serve cold.
ingredients: cucumbers, rice vinegar, sugar, salt, fresh ginger

name: turkey thighs with maple and sage
steps: Preheat the oven to 375. Place the thighs in a baking dish and put the vegetables around and under. Season the turkey with the herbs, salt and pepper. Cover and bake for 2 hours. Turn oven up to 450, uncover the turkey and brush on some maple syrup, bake for 15 minutes and then brush on some more maple syrup. Continue baking until the skin is golden and the juices run clear. Strain the vegetables out of the drippings and make gravy, if desired.
ingredients: turkey thighs, dried sage, dried thyme, dried rosemary, maple syrup, celery, onion, salt, fresh ground pepper

name: crispix sweet minglers
steps: In a large microwave-safe bowl, melt chocolate on high for 1 minute. Stir and heat an additional 30 seconds at high or until melted. Stir in peanut butter and peanuts. Gently stir in cereal, until well coated. Place powdered sugar in 2-gallon storage bag. Add cereal and close bag. Gently toss cereal mixture until well-coated. Store in airtight container in refrigerator. Use a double boiler to melt chocolate, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Stir in peanut butter and peanuts. Pour mixture over cereal and proceed with recipe.
ingredients: semisweet chocolate morsels, peanut butter, dry roasted peanuts, crispix cereal, powdered sugar

name: baked creamed spinach
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place hot spinach in a medium size bowl. Add cream cheese and sour cream and blend well. Stir in bread crumbs and seasonings. Add beaten eggs. Pour into a 8 inch square baking dish coated in cooking spray. Bake for 45 minutes.
ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, sour cream, onion powder, pepper, cream cheese, breadcrumbs, salt, garlic powder, eggs

name: fresh strawberry cream cake
steps: Beat together cake layer ingredients until well-mixed. Pour into a greased and floured sheet pan and bake at 350 for about 20-25 minutes. Allow cake to cool to room temperature. Cream together powdered sugar and cream cheese. Fold in whipped cream. Spread cream mixture over the baked and cooled cake. Slice fresh strawberries in half and arrange prettily cut side up over the cream layer. Pour glaze over the cut strawberries so that no white cream layer shows though. This cake is best served cold, so i always refrigerate for a couple hours before serving. Slice in squares and serve.
ingredients: white cake mix, water, oil, eggs, powdered sugar, cream cheese, heavy cream, fresh strawberries, strawberry glaze

name: sweet and sour beef bake
steps: Rub the roast all over with salt and pepper. In a large casserole or dutch oven, heat oil. Brown the meat on all sides. Remove, and set aside. Melt the butter in the same dutch oven. Add the onions, and garlic stirring for about 10 minutes, or until soft. Place the browned meat on top of onions in the casserole. In a small bowl, combine the sugar with the vinegar. Pour over meat. Cover, and bake in 300 degree oven for 2 hours, basting occasionally with pan juices. Stir in prunes, and cook, uncovered for 30-60 minutes longer, or until meat is tender.
ingredients: boneless beef chuck roast, salt and pepper, oil, butter, onions, fresh garlic, sugar, red wine vinegar, prune

name: chunky chicken salad for a crowd
steps: Cook chicken. Chop coarsely. Wash all fruits and vegetables. Chop them all coarsely. Put all ingredients in a large pyrex bowl. Toss ingredients with mustard and mayonnaise.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, apples, red onion, celery, walnuts, light mayonnaise, garlic mustard, italian parsley, salt and pepper

name: fresh steamed green beans with wasabi dipping sauce
steps: Steam green beans to the desired degree of doneness. Pour into a colander and rinse under cold running water for a few seconds to stop cooking process. Drain and pat dry. Whisk the salad dressing, soy sauce, sugar, lemon juice and wasabi paste in a bowl until the sugar is dissolved. Serve with the green beans for dipping.
ingredients: fresh green beans, miracle whip, soy sauce, sugar, lemon juice, wasabi paste

name: burmese breakfast fried rice
steps: Cook yellow peas along with brown sugar in rice cooker with water filled up to 4 cup mark for rice. Partially cover the rice cooker with lid to prevent overflowing during cooking. It will take about 45 min to cook. Set wok or heavy skillet on medium heat. Slice onion thinly and fry in peanut oil until golden and fragrant stirring continuously to prevent burning. Add cooked rice to wok and stir-fry for 5 minute. Add dark soy sauce to rice. Scatter 1 cup of cooked yellow peas over rice and stir-fry for another 5 minute. Serve hot accompanied by sweet milk tea. Remaining cooked peas can be packed and frozen for later use.
ingredients: peas, cooked long-grain rice, onion, dark soy sauce, brown sugar, peanut oil

name: yet another salmon with dill recipe
steps: Heat broiler. Season salmon. Set aside. Puree the garlic, dijon, lemon juice, broth, equal and dill. Place in a saucepan. Bring to a boil. Reduce by half. Brush on salmon. Broil 2 minutes each side.
ingredients: salmon fillets, salt & fresh ground pepper, garlic clove, dijon mustard, lemon juice, chicken broth, equal sugar substitute, dill

name: green beans and mushroom
steps: Drained green beans put in pot. Add mushrooms. Add chicken broth until green beans are halfway covered. Salt and pepper to taste. Heat until warm on stove top.
ingredients: green beans, fresh mushrooms, chicken broth, salt, pepper

name: chicken bisque soup
steps: Cook chicken, celery, carrots, and onion in just enough water to cover until the chicken is tender. Strain off 8 cups chicken stock. Cut up chicken and set aside. Make butter roux by melting butter and adding flour. Cook slowly. Bring chicken stock to a low boil. Slowly add roux. Simmer 15 minutes, or until soup takes on a glaze. Add pimentos, chopped chicken, peppers, and pepper. Whisk constantly.
ingredients: stewing chicken, celery ribs, carrots, onions, butter, flour, pimiento, bell pepper, black pepper

name: picante onion soup
steps: Cook onions and garlic in butter in a large saucepan, over medium-low heat until tender and golden brown. Stir frequently, about 20 minutes. Stir in tomato juice, broth, water, and picante sauce. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered, about 20 minutes more. Serve with the croutons and cheese.
ingredients: onions, garlic, butter, tomato juice, beef broth, water, picante sauce, crouton, monterey jack cheese

name: 15 minute italian chicken rice with vegetables
steps: Heat oil in large skillet on medium heat. Add chicken. Cook and stir until lightly browned, stirring occasionally. Add vegetables. Cook and stir 3 to 5 minute or until crisp-tender. Stir in broth. Bring to boil. Stir in rice and dressing. Cover. Reduce heat to low. Cook 5 minute or until liquid is absorbed and chicken is cooked through.
ingredients: oil, boneless skinless chicken breast, assorted fresh vegetables, reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth, instant rice, italian dressing

name: simple and delicious stove top mushroom gravy pork chops
steps: Brown pork chops with onions in frying pan on medium heat. Season with pepper, and garlic and onion powder to taste. Mix soup with water. Spread mixture over meat and mix to saturate meat. Let simmer for 15-20 minutes. Serve with choice of vegetables.
ingredients: pork chops, mushroom soup, onion, garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper, water

name: flourless peanut butter chocolate toffee cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine first 5 ingredients. Gently mix in chocolate chips and toffee bits. Do not overmix. Place dough on an ungreased, nonstick baking sheet. Each cookie should use a hefty tablespoon of dough. Bake for 11 to 12 minutes. Let cool for 3 to 5 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: eggs, vanilla, baking soda, brown sugar, chunky peanut butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, toffee pieces

name: cousin
steps: Rinse chicken inside and out. Place in crockpot, breast down. Sprinkle with seasonings. Cover and cook on high for 5 hours or low for 8 hours. Debone and deskin before serving.
ingredients: chicken, dry onion flakes, instant minced garlic, dried parsley, dried lemon peel, salt, pepper

name: malfadine alla romana pasta with bacon and cheese sauce
steps: If using bacon, cut into cubes. In a frying pan, saute the onion till softened but not browned. Add the lardons or bacon cubes, and brown them. Add the canned tomatoes and the chopped sun-dried tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Meanwhile, cook the malfadine al dente. Strain, then pour into the pan with the prepared sauce, adding the reserved 2 tbs pasta water and then leaving the pasta to flavor 1 minute. Add the butter and the parmesan or romano cheese, take the pan off the heat and mix everything well. Transfer to a serving dish and serve immediately.
ingredients: mafalda pasta, olive oil, onion, lardons, italian tomatoes, sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, parmesan cheese, butter, salt and pepper

name: italian tuna panini
steps: In bowl, mix together tuna, red pepper, celery, green onions, artichokes pepper, mayonnaise, plain yogurt salt and pepper. Cut buns in half horizontally. Spread tuna mixture evenly over bottom half of each. Sprinkle each evenly with cheese. Replace bun top. In nonstick skillet or grill pan or on grill, cook sandwiches over medium heat, pressing often to flatten and turning once, for about 5 minutes or until crusty and cheese is melted. Makes 4 servings.
ingredients: tuna, light mayonnaise, plain yogurt, roasted red pepper, celery, green onions, marinated artichokes, salt and pepper, italian rolls, provolone cheese

name: freddy s chocolate chip cookies with macadamia nuts
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter, both sugars and vanilla until fluffy. Beat in eggs. Sift together the flour, soda and salt. Gradually adding to creamed mixture. Mix until well blended. Fold in chocolate chips and nuts. Using a small, greased ice cream scoop, drop the cookie dough onto a parchment lined baking sheet. Bake for about 10 minutes. Remove cookies from oven, cool 1 minute then transfer to wire rack.
ingredients: butter, white sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, unbleached white flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips, macadamia nuts

name: gourmet black mole sauce
steps: Place the basic mole in a saucepan. Dissolve the tamarind concentrate in the chicken broth. Add the processed huitlacoche. Add these ingredients to the basic mole. Cook until flavors blend together. Simmer for about 5 minutes after it starts boiling. Serve over cooked chicken or turkey pieces.
ingredients: mole, tamarind paste, cuitlacoche, chicken broth

name: brunch eggs ole
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease 9-inch square or round baking pan. Beat eggs in a large bowl at high speed with an electric mixer 4-5 minutes or until slightly thickened and lemon colored. Combine flour, baking powder and salt in a small bowl. Stir flour mixture into eggs until blended. Combine monterey jack cheese, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, jalapeno pepper and hot sauce in medium bowl. Mix well. Fold into egg mixture until well blended. Pour into prepared pan. Bake 45 to 50 minutes or until golden brown and firm in center. Let stand 10 minutes before cutting to serve. Serve with salsa.
ingredients: eggs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, jalapeno peppers, small curd cottage cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, jalapeno pepper, hot pepper sauce

name: maple mustard grilled pork chops
steps: Saute onion in oil until tender, about 2 -3 minutes. Stir in syrup, vinegar, mustard, soy sauce and pepper. Let simmer gently for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside. Grill chops over medium-hot coals for 7-8 minutes, until nicely browned. Turn chops and brush liberally with glaze. Grill for 5 minutes more. Turn and brush with glaze for 3 minutes more, or until chops are done and nicely glazed. Do not overcook. Serve chops immediately.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, onion, vegetable oil, maple syrup, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, soy sauce, fresh coarse ground black pepper

name: grandma mabel s fry pan cookies
steps: Mix dates, brown sugar, egg, chopped walnuts, and butter in a cold frying pan. Turn element on and cook slowly for 10 minutes. Add rice krispies and 1 cup of the coconut. Shape into balls. Roll balls in coconut. Store in an air tight container.
ingredients: dates, brown sugar, egg, walnuts, butter, coconut, rice krispies

name: sweet and sour sauerkraut
steps: In a large skillet cook the bacon until crisp. Remove to paper towels and saute the onion in the drippings. Stir in the sauerkraut, tomatoes, brown sugar and the bacon. Bring to a boil. Transfer to a greased casserole dish. Bake, uncovered at 350 for 30-35 minutes or until bubbly.
ingredients: bacon, onion, sauerkraut, diced tomatoes, brown sugar

name: australian stuffed cucumbers
steps: Skin the cucumbers, cut in half lengthwise. Scoop out the seeds. Sprinkle with salt and leave to drain. Beat the cream cheese, pecans, hot sauce and salt together. Dry the cucumbers and spoon the cheese mixture into the center of each half. Sprinkle with chopped parsley and refrigerate. When firm cut into slices to serve.
ingredients: cucumbers, cream cheese, pecans, hot sauce, salt, parsley

name: loretta lynn s gooey cake
steps: Prepare and bake cake according to package directions,. Using a 13 x 9-inch cake pan. While warm, poke holes halfway into cake about 1 inch apart. Pour sweetened condensed milk into holes. Pour caramel topping over entire cake and chill in the refrigerator. When cake is cool, top it with cool whip and crushed heath candy. Refrigerate overnight before serving.
ingredients: german chocolate cake mix, water, eggs, oil, cool whip, heath candy bars, sweetened condensed milk, caramel topping

name: super moist stuffing for cheaters
steps: Heat broth, pepper, celery and onion in a saucepan over medium-high heat to boiling. Reduce heat to low. Cover saucepan and cook 5 minutes more till veggies are tender. Add stuffing and mix lightly. Spoon stuffing into a greased casserole dish. Cover and bake at 350 for 30 minutes.
ingredients: chicken broth, ground black pepper, celery, onion, seasoned stuffing mix

name: peanut butter banana loaf
steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Sift together the flour, baking powder, salt and baking soda and set aside. Cream together the shortening and peanut butter. Then add the sugar gradually while creaming -- continue to cream until light a fluffy. Add eggs and beat well. Stir in dry ingredients alternately with the mashed bananas. Mix well but do not beat or overmix or you will get tough bread. Spoon batter into well greased loaf pan 8x4x3. Bake for 35-45 minutes or until pick inserted in the center comes out clean.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, baking soda, shortening, crunchy peanut butter, sugar, eggs, bananas

name: hot cajun potato salad
steps: Cook un-peeled potatoes in boiling water in saucepan until tender, almost 40 minute. Fry bacon in skillet until crisp, about 10 minutes. Remove, drain on paper toweling, crumble & reserve. Cook onion in bacon drippings until partially tender, about 5 minutes. Blend together sugar, flour, salt, pepper, water and vinegar, add to onion mixture. Cook stirring constantly, until mixture thickens and bubbles, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Peel & slice potatoes, add potatoes to onion mixture, heat well, about 5 minutes. Add radishes and toss. Serve hot, topped with bacon.
ingredients: potatoes, bacon, onion, sugar, flour, salt, tabasco peppers, water, vinegar, red radish

name: mini quiche
steps: Using a 6cm cookie cutter, cut out pasty, and line small flat bottomed cup cake tin tray with pastry. Should be enough for 24 quiche. Fry bacon and place in pastry cases, put mozzarella on top of bacon. Beat eggs together and add milk, cream, nutmeg, and plain flour. Mix together. Pour small amounts of eggs mix into pastry cases until it is up to the top. Top with dried chives. Bake 20 mins until quiche has risen and looks golden.
ingredients: eggs, milk, cream, nutmeg, plain flour, frozen puff pastry, dried chives, bacon, mozzarella cheese

name: stir fried halibut with vegetables
steps: Heat oil in wok. Add fish, onion, garlic, ginger, and asparagus. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes. Stir in other ingredients. Cook 1-2 minutes more. Serve with rice.
ingredients: sesame oil, halibut, onion, garlic, soy sauce, lemon juice, frozen asparagus cuts, fresh mushrooms, tomatoes, ginger

name: baked shrimp appetizers
steps: Wash mushrooms. Chop stems. Set aside 16 shrimp. Chop remaining shrimp. Combine chopped shrimp, chopped mushrooms, crumbs, egg, milk, lemon juice, onion and salt. Spoon into mushroom caps. Top with whole shrimp and brush each appetizer with melted butter. Bake at 375 degrees for 15 minutes until tender.
ingredients: mushrooms, small shrimp, dry breadcrumbs, egg, milk, lemon juice, onion, seasoning salt, butter

name: brazilian limeade like rodizio
steps: Slice 1 lime thinly to use as garnish on glass rims. Put any remaining, unused lime pieces, along with all other ingredients, into a blender. Add 4 cups water and blend, using the pulse function, until the limes are chopped, but not pureed. Be careful not to overblend as the pith from the lime rind will cause bitterness. Pour through a strainer into a pitcher or individual glasses. Add additional water to taste, if needed. Add ice cubes to pitcher or glasses and serve immediately.
ingredients: lime, limes, sugar, sweetened condensed milk

name: oven braised onions with ham
steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Drop the unpeeled onions into a large pan of boiling water, cook 30 seconds, then drain and rinse with cold water. Cut a thin slice off the root end of each onion and peel off the skin. Heat oil in an oven proof skillet. Add bacon, red pepper, tomato paste, broth, vinegar, bay, thyme, salt and pepper and bring to a boil. Add onions, cover and bake 30-40 minutes or until onions are tender.
ingredients: cipollini onions, olive oil, canadian bacon, bell pepper, tomato paste, chicken broth, balsamic vinegar, bay leaves, fresh thyme, salt & freshly ground black pepper

name: eggplant rice casserole
steps: Slice and salt eggplant- let sit for about 20 minutes. In the mean time, make 1 cup of rice and saute the onion. Put sauce, some rice, and onion in the baking dish. Once eggplant is done, put a layer of eggplant down. Top each eggplant slice with a slice of cheese. Repeat layers- baked uncovered for 20 minutes.
ingredients: eggplant, marinara sauce, onion, rice, mozzarella cheese

name: elves belly buttons
steps: Cream crisco, sugar and gelatin together. Beat eggs in and add almond extract. Mix well. Mix remaining ingredients together and add gradually to creamed mixture -- stirring well. Chill dough overnight. When ready to bake, shape dough into small balls. And roll in granulated sugar. Place on greased sheet. Make indentation in cookie with thumb and place red cinnamon candy or quartered maraschino cherry in deperession. Bake at 375 for 10 minutes.
ingredients: crisco, sugar, lime gelatin, eggs, almond extract, flour, salt, red maraschino cherry, red-hot candies

name: chicken teriyaki skewers
steps: Soak skewers in water for about 20 minutes. Preheat grill indoor or outdoor. Mix mashed garlic with salt. Whisk garlic with soy sauce, lemon juice, ginger, honey and vinegar. Pour into sealable plastic bag and add chicken tenders. Seal and marinate for 30 minutes. Shake bag to spread marinade to all parts of chicken tenders. Thread tenders on skewers. Grill for 10-15 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
ingredients: garlic cloves, salt, soy sauce, fresh ginger, lemon juice, honey, white wine vinegar, chicken tenders, wooden skewers

name: fennel slaw
steps: Cut the fennel bulbs in half and remove the core. Shave on a mandoline or in a food processor. Cut the red onion in half,. Combine the vegetables in a bowl and add the chopped, fresh dill. With a mortar and pestle, smash the garlic with salt and pepper, adding the honey, vinegar and oil slowly. I like the pear-infused white balsamic vinegar. The rice wine vinegar is sweeter, so you might add more honey with the balsamic. When well combined, drizzle over vegetables, toss well and chill for at least 1 hour, to wilt onions slightly. Check seasoning. I serve this in a bowl with warm lentils in the bottom, crispy fish on the lentils and the slaw on top. Comfort food at its best.
ingredients: fennel bulbs, red onion, fresh dill, garlic clove, rice wine vinegar, honey, salt, black pepper, olive oil

name: cajun beef stew
steps: Pour marinade over meat in a plastic food storage bag or dish. Coat beef and let stand for 15 minutes. Spray the inside of a 4 to 5 qt crock pot with cooking spray. Place potatoes in the crock pot. Mix flour and cajun seasonings. Toss with beef and marinade, coating well. Place beef and marinade on top of the potatoes. Add the tomatoes. Cover and cook on low setting 7 to 8 hours or until beef is done. Stir in vegetables. Cover and cook on low setting for 30 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
ingredients: caribbean jerk marinade, beef stew meat, potatoes, flour, cajun seasoning, tomatoes, bell peppers, onion

name: balsamic roasted pears with pepper and honey
steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Melt butter in an 8-inch square glass baking dish in middle of oven, about 3 minutes. Arrange pears, cut sides down, in 1 layer in butter and roast in middle of oven until tender, about 20 minutes. Pour vinegar over pears and roast 5 minutes more. Transfer pears, cut sides down, to serving plates with cheese and spoon some of juices from baking dish over pears. Drizzle pears and cheese with honey and sprinkle with pepper.
ingredients: unsalted butter, pears, balsamic vinegar, manchego cheese, honey, black pepper

name: dietetic cornmeal cookies
steps: Mix softened margarine, sugar and splenda til fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Add dry ingredients to creamed mixture. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto parchment paper lined sheet. Bake 350 degree oven for 15 minutes.
ingredients: margarine, sugar, splenda granular, egg, vanilla, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, flour

name: chicken with creamy sun dried tomato sauce
steps: Pat chicken dry and season with salt and black pepper. Heat oil in a 12-inch heavy skillet over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking, then brown chicken, turning once, about 6 minutes total. Transfer with tongs to a plate. Add garlic, tomatoes, and red pepper flakes to skillet and saut, stirring, until garlic is pale golden, about 1 minute. Add wine and boil, stirring and scraping up brown bits, until reduced by half, about 1 minute. Add chicken broth and bring to a boil, covered. Add chicken to skillet with any juices accumulated on plate and simmer, covered, until just cooked through, 3 minutes approximately. Transfer chicken with tongs to a platter and keep warm, loosely covered with foil. Stir cream and 2 tablespoons basil into sauce in skillet and bring just to a simmer. Season with salt and pepper. Serve sauce over chicken and sprinkle with remaining 2 tablespoons basil.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, olive oil, garlic cloves, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, hot red pepper flakes, dry white wine, chicken broth, heavy cream, fresh basil

name: crazy cranberry bars
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a 13 x 9 pan melt butter in oven. Sprinkle crumbs over butter and pour condensed milk evenly over crumbs. Top with remaining ingredients and press down firmly. Bake 25 minutes, cool and cut into bars. Store at room temperature.
ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, sweetened condensed milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, dried sweetened cranberries, butter, flaked coconut, walnuts

name: sherry s apple and brown sugar coffee cake
steps: Preheat oven to 375. Peel apples and chop into chunks. Mix flour, butter, and brown sugar. Stir in nuts. Separate mixture into two parts. Spread half in bottom of 9 inch round pan. In another bowl beat sour cream, vanilla, and egg just until smooth. Add to other half of first mixture. Gently stir in apples no more than 2 cups. Bake 1 hour to 1 hour and 20 minutes or until inserted toothpick comes out dry.
ingredients: apples, flour, brown sugar, butter, walnuts, baking soda, salt, vanilla, egg, sour cream

name: gwyn s orange jello salad
steps: Boil water and stir in orange jello until dissolved. Add the 6 oz can of frozen orange juice and stir until dissolved. Add the pineapple and mandarin oranges to the jello mixture and stir. Pour into a 9 x 13 pan and chill until firm. Prepare instant lemon pudding according to package directions, then stir in cool whip. Layer on top of chilled jello and sprinkle with grated cheddar cheese. Chill until ready to serve.
ingredients: orange jell-o, boiling water, frozen orange juice, crushed pineapple, mandarin oranges, cool whip, instant lemon pudding, shredded cheddar cheese

name: baked chilie rellenos casserole
steps: Drain peppers, halve lenthwise, remove seeds. Cut cheese in strips to fit inside peppers. Wrap each pepper around a strip of cheese. Place stuffed peppers in a 10 x 6 x 2 baking dish. Combine eggs and milk, then beat in flour, baking powder, and salt until smooth. Pour mixture over peppers in the baking dish and sprinkle with shredded cheddar cheese. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes, or until golden brown.
ingredients: green chili peppers, monterey jack cheese, eggs, milk, flour, baking powder, salt, cheddar cheese

name: feta cheese foldovers
steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f in a small bowl, blend feta cheese, green onions, and egg. Cut pastry into 12 squares. Place a mounded tablespoon of feta mixture in the center of each square. Moisten edges with water, and fold pastry over filling to form a triangle. Press edges together firmly with a fork to seal. Lightly brush pastries with the egg yolk mixture. Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: feta cheese, green onions, garlic powder, egg, frozen puff pastry, egg yolk, water

name: throw away the bread machine instructions white bread
steps: Place the water into the bread pan. Sprinkle the sugar then the yeast over the water. Allow the yeast to foam for 10 minutes. Add in the melted butter, oil, flour and salt. Select the basic or white bread setting and press start.
ingredients: warm water, white sugar, bread machine yeast, butter, oil, white bread flour, salt

name: sauteed grape tomatoes
steps: Wash tomatoes, drain. Saute halved grape tomatoes and the next 3 ingredients in hot oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Remove from heat. Place in serving bowl or dish. Sprinkle basil over the top.
ingredients: grape tomatoes, light brown sugar, balsamic vinegar, salt, olive oil, fresh basil

name: tangy tuna pasta salad
steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain. Rinse well. Toss pasta with remaining ingredients. Chill.
ingredients: pasta, tuna, grape tomatoes, vinaigrette dressing, cheese, black olives, fresh parsley

name: no chop turkey chop suey
steps: Brown meat. Drain. Dissolve bouillon in 1 cups boiling water. Add to skillet with meat. Combine cup cold water with cornstarch. Sir into meat mixture. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until thickened. Add drained chop suey vegetables and soy sauce. Stir and cook until heated through, about 15 minutes. Serve over rice. Sprinkle with chow mein noodles.
ingredients: ground turkey, beef bouillon cubes, water, cornstarch, chop suey vegetables, soy sauce, cooked rice, chow mein noodles

name: capellini with ham and asparagus
steps: Combine the ham and oil in a large serving bowl. Place asparagus pieces in microwave on high for 4 minutes. Cook the capellini pasta according to package directions and add the microwaved asparagus. Drain capellini and asparagus and toss with ham and oil. Pour heated chicken broth over entire mixture and sprinkle with parmesean cheese.
ingredients: ham, olive oil, capellini, asparagus, chicken broth, parmesan cheese

name: nutella truffles
steps: Beat nutella with butter until well-combined. Add cognac. If too dry, add some milk. Stir in cookie crumbs and walnuts. Shape into small balls and roll in truffle shavings. Place in individual truffle cups. Best made 1 day before serving.
ingredients: petit beurre biscuits, butter, nutella, walnuts, cognac, chocolate

name: berry cream dessert
steps: In a large bowl, dissolve strawberry and raspberry gelatin in boiling water. Stir in cold water and both yogurts. Stir until well blended. Chill until mixture is syrupy, about 1 hour. Fold in strawberries and whipped topping. Spoon into individual dishes. Chill until firm, about 4 hours. Garnish with fresh berries if desired.
ingredients: strawberry gelatin, raspberry gelatin powder, boiling water, cold water, strawberry yogurt, raspberry yogurt, fresh strawberries, cool whip

name: waldorf style fruit salad
steps: In a large mixing bowl, add the apples, grapes, and oranges. Toss to mix. In a smaller bowl, add the yogurt and honey. Stir to blend. Add the yogurt-honey mixture to the fruit. Toss gently to coat. Place lettuce leaves on individual salad plates. Top with fruit mixture. Place banana slices around the edge of the plate and sprinkle walnuts over all.
ingredients: red delicious apples, red grapes, green grapes, oranges, plain yogurt, honey, lettuce leaf, bananas, walnuts

name: four cheese and pesto italian baked spaghetti
steps: Preheat over to 400f. Grease 13x9 baking dish. Cook spaghetti for 2 minutes less than the package directions specify,. Drain spaghetti well and transfer into a bowl. Stir in ricotta, pesto, 1 cup mozzarella, cup of the parmesan, and the goat cheese. Toss the mixture well and transfer it into the baking dish. Sprinkle the remaining 1 cup mozarella and cup parmesan over the pasta. Bake until the cheese is melted, about 20 minutes. Turn the oven setting to broil and broil for 1 minute or until golden. Serve hot.
ingredients: spaghetti, ricotta cheese, pesto sauce, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, goat cheese

name: baker s angel flake coconut macaroons
steps: Mix coconut, sugar, flour and salt in a large bowl. Stir in egg whites and almond extract until well blended. Drop by tablespoonful onto greased and floured cookie sheets. Bake 325f for 20 minutes or until edges of cookies are golden brown. Immediately remove from cookie sheets to wire racks. Cool completely.
ingredients: sweetened coconut, sugar, flour, salt, egg whites, almond extract

name: grilled t bone steaks with chipotle and cilantro butter
steps: Mix the butter, chilies, cilantro and tequila in a bowl to blend. Lay a sheet of plastic wrap on a work surface. Spoon the chili butter over the center of the plastic wrap. Roll the chili butter into a cylinder. Refrigerate at least 2 to 3 hours or overnight. Cut the chili butter log crosswise into 8 slices. Sprinkle the steaks with salt and black pepper. Prepare a grill or grill pan over medium-high heat. Grill the steaks for five minutes. Turn the steaks over and top each with 2 of the chili butter slices. Continue grilling for 5 minutes for medium-rare doneness, or until the butter begins to melt. Transfer the steaks to plates and serve.
ingredients: butter, chipotle chiles in adobo, fresh cilantro, tequila, coarse salt, fresh ground black pepper, beef t-bone steaks

name: succulent prawns for the barbie
steps: Combine butter, oil, herbs, lemon juice, garlic, shallots, salt and pepper in a mixing bowl. Mix in shrimp. Marinate at room temperature 1 hour. Stirring occasionally. Prepare barbecue on medium heat. Thread prawns on narrow skewers. Grill until just opaque, about 2 minutes per side. Arrange cups of letuce on a platter and then place the skewers on the platter. Garnish with lemon and serve.
ingredients: butter, olive oil, fresh herb, fresh lemon juice, garlic cloves, shallot, salt and pepper, prawns, lettuce

name: herby garlic parmesan baked chicken wings
steps: Preheat the oven to 200c. Split the chicken wings at the knuckle. Cut off the. Mix the dried herbs, cumin and salt in a bowl. Put the wings into the bowl and coat well in the mixture. Arrange on a baking tray and bake in the oven for 20-25 minutes, until cooked through. Meanwhile, heat the butter and garlic in a bowl over a pan of gently simmering water, until the butter has melted. Once the wings have cooked, dunk them in the butter and garlic mixture then sprinkle with parmesan. Serve immediately.
ingredients: chicken wings, dried oregano, dried rosemary, dried basil, ground cumin, salt, butter, garlic cloves, fresh parmesan cheese

name: breakfast for the gods
steps: Toss everything together into a bowl and mix well. Cover and refrigerate for at least overnight. You can leave it in for two days. For a flashy presentation, serve in a tall parfait glass. Garnish with fruit like strawberries, kiwi, bananas, etc. Top off with a sprig of fresh mint.
ingredients: quaker oats, non-fat vanilla yogurt, crushed pineapple, slivered almonds, strawberries

name: cuban spiced pork chops
steps: Trim excess fat from pork chops. Use a knife to cut shallow cross-hatch marks over both surfacesof the chops. Mix all remaining ingredients together in a resealable bag or non-reactive container. Add the chops and place in the refrigerator. Marinate at least an hour. Grill or broil at 500 degrees fahrenheit 8-10 minutes, turning once half way.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, limes, juice of, ground cumin, garlic cloves, onion powder, fresh ground pepper, olive oil

name: saute pork with ginger
steps: Combine all ingredients except pork to make sauce. Steep pork in sauce for 10 minutes. Do not oversteep or the pork will become tough. Heat oil in skillet and saute pork over high heat till slightly brown. Then turn and saute at medium heat. Add remaining sauce and cook for 1-2 minutes. Serve with fresh lettuce and tomato and white rice.
ingredients: pork shoulder butt, soy sauce, sake, fresh ginger, vegetable oil

name: creamy lemon oat bars
steps: Heat oven to 375f degrees. Coat 8x8 inch pan with non-stick cooking spray. Mix milk, lemon zest and lemon juice in medium bowl until thickened. Set aside. Mix remaining ingredients in medium bowl until crumbly. Press half of the crumbly mixture in pan. Bake about 10 minutes or until set. Spread lemon milk mixture over baked crust. Sprinkle remaining crumbly mixture over the lemon milk mixture, press down gently. Bake about 20 minutes or until edges are golden brown and center is set but soft. Cool completely. Cut 4 rows by 4 rows.
ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, lemon zest, fresh lemon juice, flour, old fashioned oats, brown sugar, unsalted butter, baking soda, salt

name: yam casserole
steps: Cook yams and mash. Blend with next 4 ingredients. Place in buttered casserole dish. Mix topping ingredients and sprinkle on yams. Bake at 350 degrees for 30- 40 minutes.
ingredients: yams, sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla, flour, brown sugar, pecans

name: swedish green potatoes
steps: In a large pot, boil, drain, and mash the potatoes. Add sour cream, sugar and butter and beat until fluffy. Add remaining ingredients and mix gently until well combined. Preheat oven to 400. Place potatoes in a greased baking dish and bake for 30 minutes, or until bubbly.
ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, sugar, butter, salt, pepper, fresh dill, frozen chopped spinach, cheddar cheese

name: easy orange cherry marmalade
steps: Drain and chop cherries, set aside. In a saucepan over low heat, combine all other ingredients. Heat gently until mixture comes to a boil, approximately 10 - 15 minutes. Stir in cherries. Return to boil, then remove from heat and pour into prepared jars. If your jars do not seal, store in refrigerator.
ingredients: maraschino cherries, orange marmalade, fresh lemon juice, walnuts, golden raisin

name: easy swedish pancakes
steps: In a large bowl, beat eggs with a wire whisk. Mix in milk, flour, sugar, salt and melted butter. Preheat a non-stick electric skillet to medium heat. Pour a thin layer of batter on skillet, and spread to edges. Cook until top surface appears dry. Cut into 2 or 4 sections, and flip with a spatula. Cook for another 2 minutes, or until golden brown. Roll each pancake up, and serve.
ingredients: eggs, milk, all-purpose flour, sugar, salt, butter

name: bbq salmon filet
steps: Heat the bbq to high medium. Place salmon on double foil. Rub salmon filet with olive oil. Sprinkle with chives, shallots, garlic, dill, salt& pepper. Add fine herbs. Form an envelope of the foil& pour in the wine. Seal the salmon in the foil, tucking in all the edges. Bbq apprx 20 minutes turning the salmon once- check for doneness. If not quite done continue to bbq.
ingredients: salmon, lite olive oil, chives, shallot, garlic cloves, fresh dill, salt & pepper, dried fine herbs, dry white wine, lemon wedge

name: pressed butter cookies
steps: Cream together cheese and butter thoroughly. Gradually add sugar, mixing well. Beat in vanilla. Gradually blend in flour. If desired, add food coloring. Force dough through cookie press onto ungreased cookie sheet. If desired, decorate with various types of sprinkles, sugars, etc. Bake at 375 degrees for 10- 12 minutes.
ingredients: butter, cream cheese, sugar, vanilla, flour

name: top ramen chow mein
steps: Boil the veggies in a pot just until tender, slightly firm. In a seperate pot, boil the noodles 3 or 4 minutes, and drain the water out. In a skillet, heat the oil over med-high heat and add the noodles. As they are sizzling, open only one packet of the seasoning provided in the top ramen packet, and sprinkle over the noodles. Stir the noodles occasionally allowing them to brown and crisp up a little. Add the veggies and meat, and drizzle lightly with soy sauce. Cook a few more minutes until veggies are tender and noodles are seasoned and cooked well. Serve and enjoy.
ingredients: ramen noodles, carrots, broccoli, celery ribs, chicken breast, canola oil

name: e z strawberry pizza pie
steps: Spread cookie dough on bottom of pizza pan. Bake 350 degrees for approximately 10-12 minutes. Beat cream cheese with sugar. Add vanilla. Spread cream cheese mixture on top of baked cookie dough. Mix strawberries with strawberry glaze and spread on top of cream cheese filling. Refrigerate.
ingredients: refrigerated sugar cookie dough, cream cheese, sugar, vanilla, strawberry glaze, fresh strawberries

name: frosted lemon cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine all cookie ingredients in large bowl. Beat at low speed, scraping bowl often, until well mixed. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake for 6 to 8 minutes or until edged are lightly browned. Meanwhile -- combine all glaze ingredients in small bowl. Stir until smooth. Frost warm cookies with glaze. Sprinkle with grated lemon peel, if desired.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, unsalted butter, eggs, fresh lemon rind, lemon juice, cream of tartar, baking soda, salt, powdered sugar

name: curried peanut and tomato soup
steps: Cook onion, salt, and pepper in oil in a 2 to 3 quart heavy sauce pan over moderate hear, stirring occasionally, until softened, 4 to 5 minutes. Add curry powder and cook, stirring frequently, 2 minutes. Add tomatoes and broth and simmer, uncovered, 5 minutes. Stir hot water into peanut butter until smooth and add to soup. Simmer, uncovered, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes. Stir in cilantro before serving.
ingredients: onion, salt, black pepper, vegetable oil, curry powder, diced tomatoes with juice, reduced-sodium chicken broth, hot water, smooth peanut butter, fresh cilantro

name: hamburger hot pot crock pot
steps: In skillet, lightly brown ground beef, drain well. Add seasonings. Set aside. Place half the potatoes and onions in greased crock pot. Add browned beef. Top with remaining potatoes and onions. Combine mushroom soup and water and spread over top -- being sure to moisten and cover evenly. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours.
ingredients: lean ground beef, garlic powder, salt, pepper, potatoes, onions, condensed golden mushroom soup, water

name: crock pot southwest chicken and rice
steps: Place chicken in crock pot. Combine beans, red peppers, tomatoes, onion, salt and peppr. Pour over chicken. Cover and cook on high 2 to 3 hours or until chicken is no longer pink. Serve over rice.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, black beans, roasted red peppers, mexican-style tomatoes, onion, salt, pepper, cooked rice

name: spanish rolls
steps: Mix all filling ingredients together. Slice the rolls in half horizontally. Pull some of the insides out of each half roll to form a hollow. Fill rolls with cheese by putting a mound of the filling in a bottom and putting the top on top. Wrap each roll in a piece of foil, using a sandwich wrap to seal it. Bake at 325 degrees for about 45 minutes. If you freeze them, allow about an hour for the cooking time, although the time can be adjusted according to how crispy you like them.
ingredients: cheddar cheese, onion, black olives, diced green chilies, garlic, vinegar, oil, tomato sauce, french rolls

name: spinach filling for cannelloni ravioli and tortellini
steps: Melt the butter in a saucepan and saute the onion and garlic until golden. Steam spinach until well wilted. Remove from heat, cool enough to handle, and squeeze dry. Combine onion mixture and spinach. Stir in cheeses and beat in seasonings, eggs and parsley. Refrigerate until ready to stuff pasta.
ingredients: onions, garlic cloves, butter, fresh spinach, feta cheese, farmer cheese, nutmeg, salt & freshly ground black pepper, eggs, fresh parsley

name: tomato salad jamie oliver
steps: Cut tomatoes roughly into bite sized pieces. Toss into a colander. Sprinkle liberally with kosher salt. Toss well and allow to drain 15 minutes. Transfer to a serving bowl. Add oregano, olive oil, vinegar, chili and garlic. Toss well. Serve with mozzarella.
ingredients: heirloom tomato, kosher salt, dried oregano, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, red chili pepper, garlic clove, fresh mozzarella cheese

name: honey garlic pork chops
steps: In a shallow dish, whisk together honey, soy sauce and garlic. Coat chops in mixture. Reserve left over honey mixture for basting. Place chops on greased grill over med high heat, close lid and cook. Basting 2 times.
ingredients: honey, soy sauce, garlic cloves, boneless pork loin chops

name: cherry country muffins
steps: Combine dry ingredients in a mixing bowl. In separate bowl, blend egg, vanilla, oil and milk. Stir in cherries. Pour liquid mixture over dry, stirring with several quick strokes to moisten and combine. Spoon batter into greased muffin cups. Bake at 375 degrees f for 20-25 minutes.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, sugar, egg, vanilla, vegetable oil, milk, maraschino cherry

name: maple balsamic glazed salmon
steps: In a small saucepan, combine maple syrup, vinegar, lemon juice, mustard, shallot, salt and pepper. Heat maple syrup mixture to boiling. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered, about 5 minutes, or until syrupy. Remove from heat. Stir in rosemary. Preheat broiler. Place fish on the greased unheated rack of a broiler pan and brush with half of the glaze. Broil 6-7 inches from heat for 5 minutes. Turn fish over. Brush with remaining glaze. Broil for 3 to 5 minutes more, or until fish begins to flake when tested with fork.
ingredients: salmon fillets, pure maple syrup, balsamic vinegar, lemon juice, dijon mustard, shallot, salt, pepper, fresh rosemary

name: chocolate roll
steps: Melt chocolate and butter over low heat. Add egg and beat well. In separate bowl, mix the sugar, nuts, and marshmallows. Add chocolate mixture to nut mixture and mix well. Sprinkle sheet of waxed paper with coconut. Put chocolate mixture onto waxed paper and shape into roll. Twist ends of waxed paper to seal. Wrap in additional sheet of waxed paper if desired. Place in freezer and keep there until ready to slice.
ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, butter, egg, powdered sugar, nuts, miniature marshmallow, coconut

name: oriental ramen salad
steps: Melt butter in large skillet. Add crumbled ramen noodles and nuts. Cook, stirring constantly, until noodles are golden. Remove from pan. Cool. Place evaporated milk, oil, ramen seasoning packet, vinegar and sugar in blender. Cover. Blend until smooth. Combine salad greens, noodle mixture, green onions and dressing in large bowl. Toss to coat well. Serve immediately.
ingredients: butter, oriental-flavor instant ramen noodles, sliced almonds, evaporated milk, vegetable oil, white vinegar, sugar, salad greens, green onions

name: grilled chicken breast w rosemary and thyme
steps: Preheat either grill or broiler. Combine olive oil and spices in a flat dish. Add chicken and coat both sides. Cover with plastic wrap and marinate in the fridge for 30 minutes. Grill or broil chicken for 5-7 minutes, then turn and baste with remaining marinade. Cook an additional 5-7 minutes or until inside is no longer pink. Serve. Throw away any leftover marinade.
ingredients: olive oil, oregano, thyme, dried rosemary, black pepper, garlic powder, boneless skinless chicken breasts

name: mexican cream fudge
steps: In large suacepan mix all ingredients except vanilla and nuts. Boil until it forms a soft ball, stirring constantly. Set pan in cold water and beat in vanilla and nuts. Stir until gloss leaves and is hard enough to spread in pan. Spread in pan and cool.
ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, butter, salt, white corn syrup, vanilla, pecan pieces

name: apple onion pork chops
steps: Lay pork chops on platter and season with salt and pepper if desired, than curry powder. In large skillet over medium high heat melt butter spread. Add chops and cook for approximately 8 minutes or until desired doneness, turning occasionally. Remove and set aside. Using same skillet cook onions over medium heat for approximately 7 minutes or until golden brown. Stirring occasionally, add apples and cinnamon. Cook approximately 4 minutes or until apples are tender. Pour in apple juice and scrape brown bits from bottom of the skillet cooking an additional 2 minutes. Pour sauce over pork chops and serve immediately.
ingredients: pork chops, curry powder, margarine, onions, ground cinnamon, tart apples, apple juice

name: steamed vegetable platter gronsaksfat
steps: Place whole cauliflower in a deep, large saucepan. Add 1 inch boiling water. Cover. Coook over medium heat 5 minutes. Add broccoli. Arrange cooked cauliflower, broccoli, zucchini, and carrots on a large platter. Drizzle with butter. Sprinkle with basil, salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: cauliflower head, boiling water, broccoli, zucchini, carrot, butter, basil, salt and pepper

name: mashed sweet potatoes
steps: Combine butter, cream, salt, sugar, and sweet potatoes in large saucepan. Cook, covered, over low heat, stirring occasionally, until potatoes fall apart when poked with fork. This will take between 30 to 45 minutes. Take off heat and mash sweet potatoes in saucepan with potato masher. You can also put potatoes into kitchen aid mixer and mix. Stir in salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately.
ingredients: unsalted butter, heavy cream, salt, sugar, sweet potatoes, salt & freshly ground black pepper

name: marsala sauce
steps: Add olive oil to hot saucepan. Add onions, garlic and cook 2 or 3 minutes. Add mushrooms and saut until tender. Add flour and cook 1 minute, then deglaze pan with wine. Add beef stock, blend, and cook until sauce thickens. Serve over chicken or pork.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, fresh mushrooms, flour, marsala wine, beef stock, salt & pepper

name: weird macaroni and cheese
steps: Cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain. Add shredded cheese to cooked macaroni and mix well. Set aside. Mix rest of ingredients and melt together in pan over med. Heat, stirring constantly. Add to macaroni and mix well. Place in 9 x 13 pan. Bake at 350f for 35 minutes until golden on top.
ingredients: medium pasta shells, cream of chicken soup, cream cheese, velveeta cheese, colby, water

name: basic chicken salad
steps: Place almonds in a frying pan. Toast over medium-high heat, shaking frequently. Watch carefully, as they burn easily. In a medium bowl, mix together mayonnaise, lemon juice, and pepper. Toss with chicken, almonds, onions, sweet pickles, egg and celery.
ingredients: mayonnaise, lemon juice, ground black pepper, cooked chicken, blanched slivered almond, celery, purple onion, sweet gherkins, hard-boiled egg

name: lebanese walnut cookies
steps: Line cookie sheets with parchment paper, and heat oven to 375f. Cream butter and sugar in a large bowl. Add orange water and sifted flour, and stir until the mixture forms a thick dough. Set aside. To prepare the filling, combine the nuts, sugar and cinnamon in a small bowl. Form 1 inch balls with the dough, and press the center to form a dent for the filling. Fill each cookie with about a teaspoon of the filling, and place the cookies on the parchment. Bake 15-20 minutes or until golden. Cool on wire racks.
ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, orange blossom water, flour, walnuts, cinnamon

name: horseradish deviled eggs
steps: Place yolks in a food processor. Add mayonnaise, horseradish, dill mustard, salt and pepper. Mix until smooth. If mixing by hand, itis easier to mash up yolks frist before adding the other ingredients. Put mixture into a sandwich bag with the corner cut off. Pipe yold mixture into the egg halves. Sprinkle wit paprika.
ingredients: eggs, mayonnaise, horseradish, dill, mustard, salt, black pepper, paprika

name: chicken and dressing casserole
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare 1 box of the stove top stuffing according to directions on the box and spread in the bottom of a 9 x 13 inches pan. Sprinkle cooked cubed chicken and sliced mushrooms over the dressing. Mix together soups, sour cream, and broth. Pour over chicken and mushroom layer. Prepare remaining box of stuffing and spread on top of soup layer. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 30-40 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: chicken breasts, chicken flavor stuffing mix, condensed cream of mushroom soup, condensed cream of chicken soup, sour cream, chicken broth, sliced mushrooms

name: apple pecan quick bread
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan. In a large bowl, sift together the flour, the sugar, the baking powder, and the salt, making a well in the center. Set aside. Stir in the liquid ingredients until just combined, being careful not to overmix. Gently stir in the apples and the pecans. Pour the batter into prepared pan and bake for 50-60 minutes or until a cake tester inserted into center of loaf comes out with moist crumbs attached. Do not overbake.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, orange juice, unsalted butter, eggs, golden delicious apples, pecans

name: spiced dried fruit quinoa
steps: Preheat over to 350f. Toast almonds in baking sheet for 10 minutes, stirring once. Combine water, dates, apricots, cardamom, cinnamon, ginger, salt, oil and quinoa in a medium saucepan under a medium high flame. Bring to a boil, cover and simmer for 25 minutes or until all water is absorbed. Stir in almonds and serve.
ingredients: almonds, water, dates, dried apricot, ground cardamom, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, salt, vegetable oil, quinoa

name: grilled ham and mixed cheese sandwich
steps: Combine the cheeses, mayonnaise, mustard and onion. Spread this mixture on 4 of the slices of bread. Top each cheese mixture with a ham slice, and cover with another piece of bread. Butter the top half of the sandwiches and invert onto a hot nonstick skillet, cooking over a medium heat until browned. Butter the ungrilled side and turn and grill until browned.
ingredients: monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, prepared mustard, green onion, sandwich bread, deli ham, butter

name: spiced popcorn low carb
steps: In a small bowl stir together the cumin, chili powder, salt, cayenne pepper, and ground cinnamon. Spread popped popcorn in an even layer in a large shallow baking pan. Lightly coat popcorn with cooking spray. Sprinkle the cumin mixture evenly over popcorn. Toss to coat.
ingredients: ground cumin, chili powder, salt, cayenne pepper, ground cinnamon, popped popcorn, nonstick cooking spray

name: hawaiian ginger beets
steps: Drain syrup from pineabble and combine it with vinegar, water, sugar, cornstarch, ginger and salt. Cook onion in butter in a saucepan until it is limp. Add syrup mixture and cook, stirring constantly, until thickened and clear. Add beets and remove from heat. Just before serving, add pineapple and reheat.
ingredients: pineapple tidbits, vinegar, water, sugar, cornstarch, ground ginger, salt, onion, butter, beets

name: shadows beer boiled shrimp
steps: Put all in a large pot or kettle. Cover and bring to a boil. Turn shrimp over several times while cooking. Boil 15-20 minutes or until the tails turn pink. It is better to under cook shrimp then to. Over cook.
ingredients: fresh shrimp, horseradish mustard, red peppers, black pepper, paprika, garlic salt, bay leaves, salt, beer, vinegar

name: orange rosemary pork chop
steps: Season pork chops with rosemary, salt and pepper. Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chops and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5 minutres per side. Remove to a serving platter and cover to keep warm. Add onion and garlic to the pan. Saute until soft. Add broth and orange juice, scraping to remove any browned bits from the bottom of the pan. Boil until liquid is reduced by half, about 3 minutes. Pour over pork chops and serve over rice.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, fresh rosemary, salt, black pepper, olive oil, onion, garlic clove, chicken broth, oranges, cooked rice

name: bethenny frankel s easy frittata
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Spray a smaill nonstick pan with an ovenproof handle with cooking spray. Over medium heat, saute the vegetables. In a small bowl, whisk together the egg and egg whites with a little salt and pepper. Pour the egg mixture into the pan and move it around with a spatula until slightly solidified. Transfer the pan to the oven. Bake until the frittata is almost firm to the touch. Sprinkle with the cheese and bake until firm. Serve immediately.
ingredients: vegetables, egg, egg whites, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese

name: linguine with lemon
steps: Cook pasta until al dente. While pasta is cooking zest the entire lemon and mince. In a large skillet, melt butter on low heat with a pinch of parsley. Add lemon juice, the zest, salt and pepper and garlic. Saute for for several seconds until the garlic is done. Remove from heat. Add pasta to the skillet, tossing to coat. Stire in cheese and parsley and serve.
ingredients: pasta, butter, fresh parsley, fresh lemon juice, lemon, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground pepper, parmigiano-reggiano cheese

name: spicy oatmeal cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. In a large bowl combine all ingredients and mix well. Drop cookies from a teaspoon onto a ungreased cookie sheet, bake for 12 minutes until cooky tests well when checked with a toothpick. Cool for one minute on cookie sheet. Remove to wire racks to cool.
ingredients: spice cake mix, rolled oats, eggs, vegetable oil, milk, raisins, walnuts, dark brown sugar

name: stove top like stuffing mix
steps: Combine onion flakes, dried parsley, thyme, sage, salt and pepper, and breadcrumbs or bread cubes. Store in airtight container. To prepare, combine chicken broth and butter or margarine in a saucepan. Heat until butter is melted and broth is hot. Stir in stuffing mix. Remove from heat and cover tightly. Let stand for 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork before serving.
ingredients: dried onion flakes, dried parsley, thyme, dried sage, salt and pepper, dried breadcrumbs, chicken broth, butter

name: desert safe irresistible brownies
steps: Preheat oven to 350f grease 13 x 9-inch baking pan. Combine flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt in small bowl. Beat shortening, sugar and eggs in large mixer bowl until creamy. Gradually beat in flour mixture. Stir in morsels. Pour into prepared baking pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes, or until toothpick inserted near center comes out clean. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. Cut into squares.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking cocoa, baking powder, salt, butter flavor shortening, granulated sugar, eggs, white chocolate chips

name: chicken quinoa salad
steps: Bring water and a pinch of salt to a boil in a medium saucepan. Add the quinoa, stir, cover, reduce heat to simmer for 15 minutes or until all water is absorbed. Remove from heat & remove lid to cool. In a skillet over medium heat, toast the almonds until light brown. In a large bowl, mix the oil, vinegar, salt & pepper. Stir in the quinoa to coat. Add the chicken and grapes and toss to combine. Serve sprinkled with the toasted almonds.
ingredients: water, quinoa, slivered almonds, white wine vinegar, olive oil, chicken breasts, grapes, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper

name: mix in the pan cherry cake
steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Pour oil into a 13-by 9 inch pan. Tilt pan to coat bottom with oil. Sprinkle dry cake mix evenly on top. Add eggs and water. Stir all together with a fork or spoon until thoroughly blended, about 2 minutes. Scrape sides and spread batter evenly in pan. Drop spoonfuls of pie filling randomly on top. With a fork or knife, fold pie filling into batter just enough to create a marble effect. Bake 35 to 40 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool cake at least 30 minutes in pan on a wire rack before cutting.
ingredients: vegetable oil, white cake mix, eggs, water, cherry pie filling

name: pork tenderloins asian style
steps: Combine garlic, onion, lemon juice, soy sauce, and honey in a self-sealing plastic bag. Mix well to blend, add tenderloin. Seal bag and refrigerate 4-24 hours. Remove tenderloin from marinade, discarding marinade. Grill over medium-hot coals, 20-30 minutes, turning as necessary.
ingredients: pork tenderloin, garlic cloves, onions, lemon juice, soy sauce, honey

name: brie olive spread in bread basket
steps: Blend first seven ingredients in microwave-safe bowl, and microwave for one minute. Remove, stir well, and heat for one more minute, or until fondue consistency. With a serrated knife, hollow out bread, being careful not to pierce bottom. Reserve bread cubes for dipping. Dust out loose crumbs from hollowed loaf, and rub with butter inside and out. Pour cheese mixture into bread bowl, wrap in foil, and keep warm at 250 until time to serve.
ingredients: brie cheese, gorgonzola, olive, walnuts, onion, garlic clove, fresh rosemary, artisan bread

name: blue cheese rosemary scalloped potatoes
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Butter 9x13 baking dish. Toss sliced potatoes with 2 tsp salt, pepper and rosemary. Toss cheeses together. Layer half the potatoes in the dish and sprinkle with half the cheese then top with remaining potatoes. Whisk together sour cream, cream and 1 tsp salt. Pour cream mixture over potatoes. Tap dish on counter to settle ingredients and pop any air bubbles. Top with remaining cheese. Bake for one hour and fifteen minutes or until browned and tender. Do not refrigerate overnight. Trust me.
ingredients: potatoes, salt, black pepper, fresh rosemary, blue cheese, parmesan cheese, sour cream, heavy cream

name: hearty kimchee soup
